ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: You gotta be kidding me.  You have to kill Venril Sathir to get greaves that... Summon Food!!!  Verant s idiocy has just been raised to new heights.  Hoist the
ygData.messageBody:
You gotta be kidding me. You have to kill Venril Sathir to get greaves
that...
Summon Food!!! Verant's idiocy has just been raised to new heights. Hoist
the bar fellas, there's a new plateau to be reached in terms of laughable
gains for ridiculous feats. At least I won't be too bummed that I probably
will never be able to take on Venril Sathir. I guess the only ones to get
sets of Kunark armor will be those in powerful, if not Uber, guilds.
Sheesh.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Gillan [mailto:ggillan@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 10:26 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions


I'm betting Venril Sathir. I think Shada's guild is the only one to kill
him so far, and coincidentally the only ones to find warrior and bard
greaves. :)


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
53 Minstrel of Erollisi Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 12:24 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions


can't say. don't flame me =)

Shada

> Where did the greaves drop?
